title: Software Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Video-Based Elementary Science and Mathematics Foundational Competency Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts (biological phenomena, physical laws, etc.) and simple mathematical computation skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe science experiment processes at 80% or higher using video disc visual materials
Learners can solve five or more problems through examples expressed as graphic animations of mathematical concepts
Learners can complete 90% or more of self-directed learning plans established for video content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
